name: Linux Basic
course_details: This course explores the various tools and techniques commonly used by Linux system administrators and end users to achieve their day-to-day work in a Linux environment. You will gain a good working knowledge of Linux and learn how to navigate through major Linux distributions, system configurations and graphical interface of Linux, basic command line operations, common applications of Linux, and more

name: Basic TroubleShooting
course_details: Computer Components - Before you can understand how to repair and troubleshoot a computer you must first understand the different parts and what each part does Additional lesson topics: Computer Components; Personal Computer Hardware. This lesson will cover computer power repair issues: Power Turns off Without Warning, Windows Restarts without Warning, and Keywords. Additional lesson topics: AntiVirus Link

name: Touch Typing
course_details: This course trains you to type reflexively while focusing on the text in front of you. Have you ever seen someone type rapidly without looking at the keyboard at all? They weren’t born with that ability: it is a learned skill gained through practicing specific exercises. We go over such exercises and show you how to type quickly and accurately, providing a valuable skill for the Information

name: Safe Internet browsing
course_details: Staying safe online is essential in today's world. Use these Internet safety tips to keep yourself and your loved ones protected. In this course, you will learn some tips on how to use the internet safely. The course covers email safety, making payments on the internet, child safety and how to keep your personal data safe online
